trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a way to back up a database while it is either offline or online. You can also restore a full backup from a specified location.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a way to back up a database while it is either offline or online.
You can also restore a full backup from a specified location.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides a way to back up a database while it is either offline or online.
You can also restore a full backup from a specified location.

trans-unit.source: To back up a database, you can do any of the following:

seg-source.mrk: To back up a database, you can do any of the following:

target.mrk: To back up a database, you can do any of the following:

trans-unit.source: Shut down the database and use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup12677.dita#cadminhubbkup12677"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Shut down the database and use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup12677.dita#cadminhubbkup12677"></xref>.

target.mrk: Shut down the database and use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup12677.dita#cadminhubbkup12677"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Leave the database running and call one of four system backup procedures to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup01.dita#cadminhubbkup01"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Leave the database running and call one of four system backup procedures to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup01.dita#cadminhubbkup01"></xref>.

target.mrk: Leave the database running and call one of four system backup procedures to copy it to a backup location, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup01.dita#cadminhubbkup01"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Leave the database running, but call a system procedure to freeze the database, use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, then call a system procedure to unfreeze the database, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup75469.dita#cadminhubbkup75469"></xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Leave the database running, but call a system procedure to freeze the database, use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, then call a system procedure to unfreeze the database, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup75469.dita#cadminhubbkup75469"></xref>.

target.mrk: Leave the database running, but call a system procedure to freeze the database, use operating system commands to copy it to a backup location, then call a system procedure to unfreeze the database, as described in <xref href="cadminhubbkup75469.dita#cadminhubbkup75469"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To restore a database from a backup copy, you must use one of three connection URL attributes:

seg-source.mrk: To restore a database from a backup copy, you must use one of three connection URL attributes:

target.mrk: To restore a database from a backup copy, you must use one of three connection URL attributes:
